name: double-hit
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in one turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slams the foe with a long tail, vines, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.
